channel.title: How do I create my own server?
channel.description:
Some one please help I really wanna create my own sever on moparscape. Can any one tell me how to do this ??? :confused: :mad:
P.S- please help. From: Your buddy - Cheese45 :D

item.source: How do I create my own server?

item.title: How do I create my own server?
item.dc:creator: @hippyss hippyss
item.description:
@hippyss wrote:

[glow=red,2,300]Egh. i’ll post a guide from a friend here.[/glow]

Now lets start off by downloading
Java SE now click JDK 6.0

I’m guessing you already have moparscape if not download it now. You will also need to download a source Cheezscape and Testscape are the easiest to use. If you want a Pvp server I recommend Pimpscape source. --pimpscape source---->http://www.megaupload.com/?d=B0HPUJEE

If you plan on hosting a server the easiest way is hamachi, you can download it at this link:
www.Hamachi.cc

Click start a new network and pick a name and a password you want anyone to know. For people to play they also need hamachi and they need to join your network.

when in your server source, right click compile.bat and click “edit”. Then erase everything in it and put this in it’s place:

CODE
@echo off
title Compiler
“%ProgramFiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
pause

Ok now save it and right click runserver.bat and erase all of that and add this:

CODE

@echo off
title Runserver
set java=“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe”
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
pause

Some credit to: mod taharok
Guide by: Evil at Last of justascape.r8.org
Links by me!

Read full topic
item.source: How do I create my own server?
